resources.string: A world where there is no corporate bullshit, a world where we all know what we are buying. Thatâ€™s the world that noBS ratings wants. \n\n Our rating system gives the power back to consumers by providing them with information about the social and ethical impact of the businesses they support

We were formed over the 15/16 summer as we went through the Live the Dream social entrepreneurship accelerator program. At our core is the Nobs community, the changemakers that use our ratings. \n\n The core team is a bunch of university students that share our passion to eliminate the bullshit!
